name: Bountiful Harvest Fruit Cart
description: An ordinary fruit cart that has an orange and white ceiling.\nIn the eyes of the common people of Mondstadt, orange represents the harvest, while the same color is seen to be similar to gold in Liyue traditions, and it is seen to be a good omen of coming fortune.\nFortunately, both the Knights of Favonius and the Liyue Qixing manage crops very well, resulting in stable harvests every year.
